[docs]class StreamNotFoundError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class StreamAlreadyExistsError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class StreamDataNotAvailableError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class ToolNotFoundError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class ChannelNotFoundError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class ChannelAlreadyExistsError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class IncompatiblePlatesError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class StreamNotAvailableError(Exception):
    message = 'The stream is not available after {} and cannot be calculated'

    def __init__(self, up_to_timestamp):
        super(StreamNotAvailableError, self).__init__(self.message.format(up_to_timestamp))




[docs]class ToolExecutionError(Exception):
    message = 'Tool execution did not cover the time interval {}.'

    def __init__(self, required_intervals):
        super(ToolExecutionError, self).__init__(self.message.format(required_intervals))




[docs]class PlateEmptyError(Exception):
    message = 'Plate values for {} empty'

    def __init__(self, plate_id):
        super(PlateEmptyError, self).__init__(self.message.format(plate_id))




[docs]class PlateDefinitionError(Exception):
    message = "Empty values in plate definition and complement=False"




[docs]class FactorDefinitionError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class LinkageError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class NodeAlreadyExistsError(Exception):
    message = "Cannot have duplicate nodes"




[docs]class FactorAlreadyExistsError(Exception):
    message = "Cannot have duplicate factors - a new factor object should be created"
